    • Constructor Detail

      • PID

        public PID​(double desiredValue,
           double samplePeriod,
           double KP,
           double KI,
           double KD,
           double AIWR,
           boolean ADWR)
        initiates a PID-object with the following parameters
        Parameters:
        desiredValue - reference variable
        samplePeriod - sample period
        KP - proportional parameter
        KI - integral parameter
        KD - differential parameter
        AIWR - anti-integral-windup value
        ADWR - choose if anti-differential-windup

    • Method Detail

      • runControl

        public double runControl​(double measuredValue)
        calculates the closes-loop control variable
        Parameters:
        measuredValue - feedback variable
        Returns:
        control variable

      • updateDesiredValue

        public void updateDesiredValue​(double desiredValue)
        updates the reference variable of the controller
        Parameters:
        desiredValue - new reference variable
